errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.weightMin: Weight must be at least 35 kg
errors.weightMax: Weight must be at most 150 kg
errors.sportHoursMin: Activity time will be more 1 hour
errors.sportHoursMax: Activity time will not be more 10 hour
errors.waterRateMin: Water intake will be more 1 L !

onboarding.1: This is your personal water tracker.
onboarding.2: Here you can see your daily water allowance.
onboarding.3: You can see how close you are to your goal of drinking water for the day.
onboarding.4: This field will display the amount of water and you can add, edit or delete an entry for water consumption.
onboarding.5: This is the panel for your personal settings, including personal information and water tracking preferences.
onboarding.6: This calendar will display how many percent of water was drunk each day.
onboarding.7: Use this button to switch between the calendar and schedule views.
